me.soxey6.engine.objects

Class GameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.soxey6.engine.main.Wrapper
      • me.soxey6.engine.objects.GameObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Block, Bullet, Pellet, SnakeHead, SnakeTail

    public class GameObject
extends Wrapper
    The basic game object, used to create any object rendered in the game

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameObject

        public GameObject(java.lang.String name,
                  Scene scene,
                  Color colour,
                  float posX,
                  float posY,
                  float sizeX,
                  float sizeY)
        The basic game object, used to create any object rendered in the game
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the object
        scene - The parent scene of the object
        colour - The colour of the object being drawn
        posX - The position x of the game object
        posY - The position y of the game object
        sizeX - The size x of the game object
        sizeY - The size y of the game object
